# Enable OIDC grafana

## APIs with OAuth

```shell
curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/api/orgs \
  --header 'Authorization: bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjI4YzdkOGMzODlkMGIwN2FmMGEzYTRhOWJmNzBmZmU0N2RmYTc4Y2QifQ..I4WVjxkxzS6CTuBtXhMaX7yPG6Hyl86iGWkYU4S3WNdQu-yTFo6mq60NrNLVQmOBfQ7a4igV3HdsikDZzPa_mG1ySBsVlZb-egUzEz14k9R2R2Ou8N4TftJftOYaUk6Zr656lq0n8b7FSg02jMNiur22jGoDIciW6et9JRqerSisGxOb6lvWxWsynKAu0uzUkIaKmw-Wd6ShlCrYSHj7eMShR9KBtu69-uNLvJNWiueYYc9ja534gRRnOutzBvKj0Vgq4-bCvWUrX3wLksMyN1vt9t65Qevc6sGxsT_e7sLJ9-iAp_AVb1M6jJviI5nKJ2wH6M0B9xjZcvbxF6lqEw'
```

## APIs with Session

```shell
curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/api/orgs \
  --header 'Cookie: grafana_session=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IjI4YzdkOGMzODlkMGIwN2FmMGEzYTRhOWJmNzBmZmU0N2RmYTc4Y2QifQ..I4WVjxkxzS6CTuBtXhMaX7yPG6Hyl86iGWkYU4S3WNdQu-yTFo6mq60NrNLVQmOBfQ7a4igV3HdsikDZzPa_mG1ySBsVlZb-egUzEz14k9R2R2Ou8N4TftJftOYaUk6Zr656lq0n8b7FSg02jMNiur22jGoDIciW6et9JRqerSisGxOb6lvWxWsynKAu0uzUkIaKmw-Wd6ShlCrYSHj7eMShR9KBtu69-uNLvJNWiueYYc9ja534gRRnOutzBvKj0Vgq4-bCvWUrX3wLksMyN1vt9t65Qevc6sGxsT_e7sLJ9-iAp_AVb1M6jJviI5nKJ2wH6M0B9xjZcvbxF6lqEw'
```
